user.title: TeamSnap
user.description:
To connect Home Assistant to TeamSnap, you need to configure Application Credentials first.

**Step 1:** Go to **Settings** → **Application Credentials** → **Add Application** → **TeamSnap**

**Step 2:** Enter your Client ID and Client Secret from your TeamSnap OAuth application

**Step 3:** Set the redirect URI in your TeamSnap OAuth app to:
`{redirect_uri}`

**Step 4:** Click Submit below to continue with OAuth authentication.

error.oauth_setup_error: Unable to initialize OAuth flow. Please ensure Application Credentials are configured correctly.
error.missing_configuration: OAuth configuration is missing. Please configure Application Credentials first (Settings → Application Credentials), and verify that the redirect URI in your TeamSnap OAuth app matches: {redirect_uri}
